item.title: 主要电信公司敦促欧盟冯德莱恩放宽兼并规则以促进投资
item.description: 欧洲最大的电信公司周二敦促欧盟委员会主席放宽欧盟的兼并规则，他们表示此举将促进对数字基础设施急需的投资，并帮助他们与美国和亚洲的同行竞争。【原文：Europe's biggest telecommunications companies urged the head of the European Commission on Tuesday to loosen EU merger rules, a move they said would boost much-needed investments in digital infrastructure and help them compete with U.S. and Asian peers.】

item.title: Palo Alto 推出人工智能驱动的安全产品以应对网络攻击
item.description: Palo Alto Networks 正在扩大其人工智能驱动的网络安全产品，因为客户希望确保其业务运营免受不断增加的黑客攻击事件的影响。【原文：Palo Alto Networks is expanding its artificial intelligence-powered cybersecurity offerings, as clients seek to secure their business operations from rising hacking incidents.】

item.title: 华尔街对微软和 OpenAI 新交易的反应
item.description: 微软和 OpenAI 周二表示，双方已达成协议，允许这家 ChatGPT 制造商重组为一家公益公司，OpenAI 的估值将达到 5000 亿美元，并为其成为一家上市公司扫清了障碍。【原文：Microsoft and OpenAI on Tuesday said they had reached a deal to allow the ChatGPT maker to restructure itself into a public benefit corporation, valuing OpenAI at $500 billion and clearing the way for it to become a publicly traded company.】

item.title: 美国初创公司 Substrate 发布芯片制造工具，称可与 ASML 匹敌
item.description: 美国一家小型初创公司 Substrate 周二表示，它已开发出一种芯片制造工具，能够与荷兰 ASML 公司生产的最先进光刻设备相媲美。【原文：Substrate, a small U.S. startup, said on Tuesday that it had developed a chipmaking tool capable of competing with the most advanced lithography equipment made by Dutch firm ASML .】

item.title: 首席执行官称淡水河谷有望夺回全球铁矿石产量第一的宝座
item.description: 巴西矿业公司淡水河谷首席执行官古斯塔沃-皮门塔（Gustavo Pimenta）周二表示，淡水河谷有信心在今年重新夺回全球最大铁矿石生产商的地位。【原文：Brazilian miner Vale is confident it will regain this year the position of the world's largest iron ore producer, CEO Gustavo Pimenta said on Tuesday, a title it had lost to Rio Tinto in recent years.】

item.title: 新款 iPhone 重振销售，苹果市值突破 4 万亿美元
item.description: 周二，苹果公司的市值首次突破 4 万亿美元，成为第三家达到这一里程碑的大型科技公司，因为对其最新 iPhone 机型的强劲需求缓解了人们对其在人工智能竞赛中进展缓慢的担忧。【原文：Apple topped $4 trillion in market value for the first time on Tuesday, the third Big Tech company to hit the milestone, as robust demand for its latest iPhone models allayed fears over its slow progress in the AI race.】

item.title: ADP 将公布每周美国私营企业薪资数据，预计截至 10 月 11 日的 4 周内平均增加就业岗位 14,250 个
item.description: ADP全国就业报告》（ADP National Employment Report）周二发布的首次周度初步估计显示，在截至10月11日的四周内，美国私营企业平均增加了14250个工作岗位。【原文：U.S. private payrolls increased by an average 14,250 jobs in the four weeks ending October 11, the ADP National Employment Report's inaugural weekly preliminary estimate showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 数百名空中交通管制员因停航而从事第二份工作
item.description: 一位工会官员周二表示，数百名美国空中交通管制员在周二错过了他们的第一份全额工资支票后，临时做起了第二份工作，这给紧张的航空安全系统带来了更大的压力。【原文：Hundreds of U.S. air traffic controllers have taken temporary second jobs as they miss their first full pay check on Tuesday, putting more pressure on the strained aviation safety system, a union official said Tuesday.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州起诉泰诺制药公司J&J和Kenvue，称他们隐瞒了药物的自闭症风险
item.description: 本周二，泰诺的制造商强生公司和肯维公司被德克萨斯州总检察长肯-帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）起诉，指控他们故意隐瞒该药与自闭症和注意力缺陷多动障碍的联系。【原文：The makers of Tylenol, Johnson & Johnson and Kenvue , were sued on Tuesday by Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton, who accused them of knowingly hiding the drug's links to autism and attention deficit hyperactivity disorder.】

item.title: OpenAI 将在印度免费提供一年的 ChatGPT Go
item.description: 这家由微软支持的初创公司周二表示，OpenAI 将从 11 月 4 日起向印度用户免费提供一年的 ChatGPT Go 订阅服务，以提高其在印度第二大市场的采用率。【原文：OpenAI will offer its ChatGPT Go subscription free to users in India for one year starting November 4, the Microsoft- backed startup said on Tuesday, as it seeks to boost adoption in its second-largest market.】

item.title: 微软与 OpenAI 达成新协议，允许 OpenAI 重组
item.description: 微软周二表示，它已与 OpenAI 达成协议，允许这家 ChatGPT 制造商重组为一家公益公司，之后微软将持有这家人工智能初创公司约 1,350 亿美元的股份，或 27% 的股份。【原文：Microsoft said on Tuesday it has reached a deal with OpenAI to allow the ChatGPT maker to restructure itself into a public benefit corporation, following which Microsoft would hold a stake of about $135 billion - or 27% - in the AI startup.】

item.title: 美国联邦住房与家庭管理局（FHFA）称 8 月份美国单户住宅价格上涨
item.description: 尽管供应量大幅增加，但 8 月份美国独户住宅价格仍有所上涨，这表明对于许多潜在购房者来说，经济承受能力仍是一个挑战。【原文：U.S. single-family house prices increased in August even as supply has improved significantly, suggesting affordability would remain a challenge for many prospective home buyers.】

item.title: 2025 年前九个月，UPS 裁员 34000 人
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周二表示，今年前九个月已裁员 3.4 万人。【原文：United Parcel Service said on Tuesday it has cut 34,000 jobs over the first nine months of this year.】

item.title: Snap 旨在通过为 Snapchat+ 用户提供新功能提高留存率
item.description: Snap正在为其订阅式社交媒体平台Snapchat+推出新的个性化和定制功能，目的是在激烈的市场竞争中提高付费用户群的留存率。【原文：Snap is rolling out new personalization and customization features for its subscription-based social media platform Snapchat+, aiming to boost retention among its paying user base in an intensely competitive market.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空因强劲的高端需求和成本控制，亏损低于预期
item.description: 美国捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周二公布的季度亏损小于预期，原因是对高端旅行的稳定需求和成本控制努力帮助缓冲了利润率。【原文：U.S. carrier JetBlue Airways reported a smaller-than-expected quarterly loss on Tuesday, as steady demand for premium travel and cost-control efforts helped cushion margins.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：博裕资本领跑星巴克中国股权争夺战
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，私募股权公司博裕资本（Boyu Capital）已成为收购星巴克中国业务控股权的领跑者，该交易对星巴克中国业务的估值可能超过 40 亿美元。【原文：Private equity firm Boyu Capital has emerged as the frontrunner to buy a controlling stake in Starbucks' China business in a deal that could value the unit at more than $4 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 康宁业绩受光纤部门疲软影响，股价下跌
item.description: 大猩猩玻璃制造商康宁公司周二预计，第四季度销售额将高于分析师预期，但其生产光纤产品的最大业务部门的收入低于预期。【原文：Gorilla Glass maker Corning on Tuesday forecast fourth-quarter sales above analysts' estimates, but revenue from its largest business unit that makes fiber optic products fell short of expectations.】

item.title: 租赁需求强劲，美国塔台季度收入超出预期
item.description: 美国铁塔公司周二公布的第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，主要得益于数据中心的强劲需求和电信公司在网络覆盖方面的强劲支出。【原文：American Tower on Tuesday beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue, helped by strong data center demand and robust spending from telecom companies on network coverage.】

item.title: 中国在最新的五年计划中将电动汽车排除在外，行业正努力解决供过于求的问题
item.description: 中国在其 2026-2030 五年发展规划中将电动汽车从战略产业名单中删除，这是十多年来首次将其排除在外，因为该行业正努力应对供过于求的挑战。【原文：China has omitted electric vehicles from its list of strategic industries in its five-year development plan for 2026-2030, marking their first exclusion in more than a decade, as the sector grapples with oversupply challenges.】

item.title: 受电气设备需求影响，Hubbell 上调 2025 年利润展望
item.description: Hubbell 周二上调了对 2025 年调整后利润的预期，原因是数据中心对其电气设备的需求强劲。【原文：Hubbell lifted its forecast for 2025 adjusted profit on Tuesday, banking on strong demand for its electrical equipment from data centers.】

item.title: 甲骨文称人工智能具有真正价值，因为需求远远超过供给
item.description: 甲骨文公司首席执行官迈克-西西利亚（Mike Sicilia）周二表示，他并不担心 "人工智能泡沫"，并补充说，人工智能具有真正的价值，因为需求远远超过供给。【原文：Oracle CEO Mike Sicilia said on Tuesday that he is not concerned about an "AI bubble," adding that there is real value in artificial intelligence as demand far outpaces supply.】

item.title: Adobe 为人工智能助手重新设计应用程序，寻求与 ChatGPT 集成
item.description: Adobe 周二表示，它的视频和图像编辑工具可以通过聊天来控制，并补充说，它正在与 ChatGPT 的创建者 OpenAI 合作，让用户通过流行的聊天机器人服务直接控制它的一个应用程序。【原文：Adobe said on Tuesday its video and image editing tools can be controlled by chatting with them, adding that it is working with ChatGPT creator OpenAI to let users directly control one of its apps with the popular chatbot service.】

item.title: 谢尔温-威廉姆斯（Sherwin-Williams）专业涂料需求强劲，利润超预期
item.description: 谢尔温-威廉姆斯公司（Sherwin-Williams）周二公布的季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于专业油漆工的强劲需求和防护涂料业务销售额的增长。【原文：Sherwin-Williams beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly profit on Tuesday, boosted by strong demand from professional painters and higher sales in its protective coatings business.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击美联储主席，希望在几个月内更换人选
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，有一长串人可以接管美联储，并抨击了任期将于五月结束的现任主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday said there was a long list of people who could take over the Federal Reserve, slamming current chairman Jerome Powell, whose term ends in May.】

item.title: 报告显示，特斯拉首席执行官马斯克的党派政治让汽车制造商损失了 100 多万辆电动汽车的销量
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）自 2022 年收购 Twitter（后更名为 X）以来的极化政治行为极大地损害了这家汽车制造商在美国的销量，凸显出其命运与这位亿万富翁的个人形象交织在一起的程度有多深。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk's polarizing political actions since acquiring Twitter, later rebranded X, in 2022 dramatically hurt the automaker's U.S. sales, underscoring how deeply its fortunes are intertwined with the billionaire's persona.】

item.title: 早间竞价黄金遭抛售，股市停滞不前
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 由于 Dupixent 需求强劲，Regeneron 季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 受湿疹治疗药物 Dupixent 和癌症治疗药物 Libtayo 需求强劲的帮助，Regeneron 制药公司周二公布的第三季度业绩超出华尔街预期，股价盘前上涨 5.6%。【原文：Regeneron Pharmaceuticals beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter results on Tuesday, helped by strong demand for its eczema treatment, Dupixent, and cancer treatment Libtayo, sending its shares up 5.6% premarket.】

item.title: 特朗普表示将于周三会见英伟达首席执行官
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将于周三会见英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said he would meet with Nvidia Chief Executive Jensen Huang on Wednesday.】

item.title: 沙特人工智能公司 Humain 与谷歌合作，并寻求与 AWS 达成交易
item.description: 沙特人工智能公司Humain的首席执行官塔里克-阿明（Tareq Amin）周二表示，该公司已与谷歌建立了合作关系，并称可能即将与亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）开展重要合作。【原文：Saudi AI firm Humain's CEO Tareq Amin said on Tuesday the company has a partnership with Google and said there might be an upcoming significant collaboration with Amazon Web Services.】

item.title: MSCI 公布第三季度利润增长，原因是指数产品需求强劲
item.description: 指数提供商摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）周二公布第三季度利润增长，原因是客户支出增加推动了对其指数产品和分析服务的需求。【原文：Index provider MSCI reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, as improved client spending drove up demand for its index products and analytics services.】
